description: I try to live each day like it's the last day. I am a happy person and l like having fun but looking for a serious relationship. I don't like people that like to argue and have a short fuse. You have to be flexible in a relationship and very patient. I like to travel, swimming, tennis, taking my dog for a walk, coffee shops, ballet, live theatre, dining out at classy restaurants. My zodiac sign is Leo and my best matches are number one Sagittarius, Libra, Aries Taurus and Libra. I am a fire sign and I am very compatible with a Sagittarius another fire sign...lots of fire to say the least.
